git_rationale.why_issue_occurred: Previous implementation incorrectly placed skills in .claude/commands/ directory instead of .claude/skills/
git_rationale.how_fix_addresses_root: Created proper .claude/skills/airbnb/ structure with SKILL.md, progressive disclosure pattern, and correct MCP tool naming conventions

dev.qa_notes: Verify: (1) SKILL.md has correct YAML frontmatter, (2) Tool categories use correct MCP naming (mcp__plugin_airbnb_airbnb__*), (3) Progressive disclosure implemented (main file ~600 tokens), (4) Accommodation agent references correct skill path, (5) No API keys in files, (6) MCP server config documented

tool_categories.name: search
tool_categories.purpose: Search Airbnb listings with location, date, guest, and price filters

tool_categories.name: details
tool_categories.purpose: Get comprehensive property information including amenities, policies, pricing

examples.name: family-trip
examples.scenario: 7-night family vacation rental search with complete workflow

mcp_tools_documented.returns: Array of property listings with id, name, url, price, rating, reviewCount, location, propertyType, bedrooms, beds, bathrooms, maxGuests, isSuperhost, plus searchUrl and pagination cursor

Complete listing details including description, host info, location (lat/lng), capacity, amenities array, pricing breakdown (basePrice, cleaningFee, serviceFee, total), policies (checkIn, checkOut, houseRules, cancellationPolicy), rating, reviewCount, reviews sample
